attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The centrum ice rink was a very popular building for many different sports till it was closed down.  Ice hockey was very popular in Ayrshire and can become popular again if the ice rink is saved.  So please show your support!!!

rejection.details: This is a devolved matter and should be directed to the Scottish Executive as appropriate.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
